GSP33bhgsbh_u:400: yasmād evaṃ nityo 'vikriyaś cātmā tasmād yudhyasva, yuddhād uparamaṃ mā kārṣīḥ ity arthaḥ |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:2869: atas tvam eva cchettum arhasīty arthaḥ ||BhGS_6.39||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2872: pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2873: na hi kalyāṇa-kṛt kaścid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati ||BhG_6.40||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2874: he pārtha naiva iha loke nāmutra parasmin vā loke vināśas tasya vidyate nāsti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2875: nāśo nāma pūrvasmāt hīnajanmaprāptiḥ sa yogabhraṣṭasya nāsti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2876: na hi yasmāt kalyāṇakṛt śubhakṛt kaścit durgatiṃ kutsitāṃ gatiṃ he tāta,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2877: tanoti ātmānaṃ putrarūpeṇeti pitā tāta ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2883: prāpya puṇya-kṛtāṃ lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2885: yoga-mārge pravṛttaḥ saṃnyāsī sāmarthyāt prāpya gatvā puṇya-kṛtām aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2886: tatra coṣitvā vāsam anubhūya śāśvatīr nityāḥ samāḥ saṃvatsarān,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2887: tad-bhoga-kṣaye śucīnāṃ yathokta-kāriṇāṃ śrīmatāṃ vibhūti-matāṃ gehe gṛhe yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ abhijāyate ||BhGS_6.41||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2889: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2890: etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam ||BhG_6.42||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2891: athavā śrīmatāṃ kulāt anyasmin yoginām eva daridrāṇāṃ kule bhavati jāyate dhīmatāṃ buddhimatām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2894: durlabhataraṃ duḥkha-labhyataraṃ pūrvam apekṣya loke janma yad īdṛśaṃ yathokta-viśeṣaṇe kule ||BhGS_6.42||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2898: yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana ||BhG_6.43||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2899: tatra yogināṃ kule taṃ buddhi-saṃyogaṃ buddhyā saṃyogaṃ buddhi-saṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadehikaṃ pūrvasmin dehe bhavaṃ paurvadehikam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2900: yatate ca prayatnaṃ ca karoti tatas tasmāt pūrva-kṛtāt saṃskārāt bhūyo bahutaraṃ saṃsiddhau saṃsiddhi-nimittaṃ he kuru-nandana ||BhGS_6.43||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2903: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2906: tenaiva balavatā hriyate saṃsiddhau hi yasmād avaśo 'pi sa yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2907: na kṛtaṃ ced yogābhyāsajāt saṃskārāt balavattaram adharmādi-lakṣaṇaṃ karma,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2911: tat-kṣaye tu yogajaḥ saṃskāraḥ svayam eva kāryam ārabhate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2913: ato jijñāsur api yogasya svarūpaṃ jñātum icchann api yoga-mārge pravṛttaḥ saṃnyāsī yoga-bhraṣṭaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2914: sāmarthyāt so 'pi śabda-brahma vedokta-karmānuṣṭhāna-phalam ativartate 'tikrāmaty apākariṣyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2915: kim uta buddhvā yo yogaṃ tan-niṣṭho 'bhyāsaṃ kuryāt ||BhGS_6.44||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2920: prayatnād yatamānaḥ, adhikaṃ yatamāna ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2921_0: tatra yogī vidvān saṃśuddha-kilbiṣo viśuddha-kilbiṣaḥ saṃśuddha-pāpo 'neka-janma-saṃsiddhir
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2921_1: anekeṣu janmasu kiṃcit kiṃcit saṃskāra-jātam upacitya tena upacitenāneka-janma-kṛtena
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2921_2: saṃsiddho 'neka-janma-saṃsiddhas tataḥ labdha-samyag-darśanaḥ san yāti parāṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2925: karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna ||BhG_6.46||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2931: tadvadbhyo 'dhiko yogī viśiṣṭo yasmāt tasmād yogī bhavārjuna ||BhGS_6.46||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2934: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ ||BhG_6.47||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2935: yoginām api sarveṣāṃ rūdrādityādi-dhyāna-parāṇāṃ madhye mad-gatena mayi vāsudeve samāhitenāntarātmanāntaḥ-karaṇena śraddhāvān śraddadhānaḥ san bhajate sevate yo mām,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2936: sa me mama yuktatamo 'tiśayena yukto mato 'bhipreta iti ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2945: śraddhāvānbhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ [Gītā 6.47]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2948: evaṃ mad-gatāntar-ātmā syād ity etat vivakṣuḥ śrī-bhagavān uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2949: mayy āsaktamanāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan madāśrayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2950: asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu ||BhG_7.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2951: mayi vakṣyamāṇa-viśeṣaṇe parameśvare āsaktaṃ mano yasya saḥ mayy āsakta-manāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2952: he pārtha ! yogaṃ yuñjan manaḥ-samādhānaṃ kurvan,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2953: mad-āśrayo 'ham eva parameśvaraḥ āśrayo yasya saḥ mad-āśrayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2954: yo hi kaścit puruṣārthena kenacit arthī bhavati sa tat-sādhanaṃ karmāgnihotrādi tapo dānaṃ vā kiṃcid āśrayaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2955: ayaṃ tu yogī mām evāśrayaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2956: hitvānyat sādhanāntaraṃ mayy eva āsakta-manā bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2957: yas tvaṃ evaṃ-bhūtaḥ san asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ samastaṃ vibhūti-bala-śakty-aiśvaryādi-guṇa-saṃpannaṃ māṃ yathā yena prakāreṇa jñāsyasi saṃśayam antareṇaivam eva bhagavān iti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2961: jñānaṃ te 'haṃ sa-vijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2962: yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate ||BhG_7.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2963: jñānaṃ te tubhyam ahaṃ sa-vijñānaṃ vijñāna-sahitaṃ svānubhava-yuktam idaṃ vakṣyāmi kathayiṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ kārtsnyena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2964: taj jñānaṃ vivakṣitaṃ stauti śrotuḥ abhimukhīkaraṇāya - yaj jñātvā yaj jñānaṃ jñātvā neha bhūyaḥ punar anyat jñātavyaṃ puruṣārtha-sādhanam avaśiṣyate nāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2965: iti mat-tattva-jño yaḥ, sa sarvajño bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2969: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2970: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ ||BhG_7.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2971: manuṣyāṇāṃ madhye sahasreṣu anekeṣu kaścit yatati prayatnaṃ karoti siddhaye siddhy-artham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2973: siddhā eva hi te ye mokṣāya yatante,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2974: teṣāṃ kaścid eva hi māṃ vetti tattvato yathāvat ||BhGS_7.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2977: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2978: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā ||BhG_7.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2981: tathāb-ādayo 'pi tanmātrāṇy eva ucyante - āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ kham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2982: mana iti manasaḥ kāraṇam ahaṃkāro gṛhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2985: yathā viṣa-saṃyuktam annaṃ viṣam ity ucyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2986: evam ahaṃkāra-vāsanāvad avyaktaṃ mūla-kāraṇam ahaṃkāra ity ucyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2988: ahaṃkāra eva hi sarvasya pravṛtti-bījaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ loke |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2989: itīyaṃ yathoktā prakṛtir me mamaiśvarī māyā-śaktir aṣṭadhā bhinnā bhedam āgatā ||BhGS_7.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2991: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2994: ito 'syāḥ yathoktāyās tv anyāṃ viśuddhāṃ prakṛtiṃ mamātma-bhūtāṃ viddhi me parāṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ jīva-bhūtāṃ kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇāṃ prāṇa-dhāraṇa-nimitta-bhūtāṃ he mahābāho,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2998: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā ||BhG_7.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:2999: etad-yonīni ete parāpare kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇe prakṛtī yonir yeṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ tāni etad-yonīni,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3001: yasmāt mama prakṛti yoniḥ kāraṇaṃ sarva-bhūtānām,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3002: ato 'haṃ kṛtsnasya samastasya jagataḥ prabhava utpattiḥ pralayo vināśas tathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3003: prakṛti-dvaya-dvāreṇāhaṃ sarvajña īśvaro jagataḥ kāraṇam ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_7.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3006: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid asti dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3007: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva ||BhG_7.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3008: mattaḥ parameśvarāt parataram anyat kāraṇāntaraṃ kiṃcit nāsti na vidyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3009: aham eva jagat-kāraṇam ity arthaḥ, he dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3010: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt mayi parameśvare sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvam idaṃ jagat protam anusyūtam anugatam anuviddhaṃ grathitam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3011: dīrgha-tantuṣu paṭavat, sūtre ca maṇi-gaṇā iva ||BhGS_7.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3013: kena kena dharmeṇa viśiṣṭo tvayi sarvam idaṃ protam ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3015: praṇavaḥ sarva-vedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu ||BhG_7.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3016: raso 'ham, apāṃ yaḥ sāraṃ sa rasaḥ, tasmin rasa-bhūte mayi āpaḥ protā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3018: yathāham apsu rasaḥ, evaṃ prabhāsmi śaśi-sūryayoḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3019: praṇava oṃkāraḥ sarva-vedeṣu, tasmin praṇava-bhūte mayi sarve vedāḥ protāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3020: tathā khe ākāśe śabdaḥ sāra-bhūtaḥ, tasmin mayi khaṃ protam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3021: tathā pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya bhāvaḥ pauruṣaṃ yataḥ puṃ-buddhir nṛṣu,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3024: gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3028: puṇyatvaṃ gandhasya svabhāvata eva pṛthivyāṃ darśitam ab-ādiṣu rasādeḥ puṇyatvopalakṣaṇārtham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3029: apuṇyatvaṃ tu gandhādīnām avidyā-dharmādy-apekṣaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ bhūta-viśeṣa-saṃsarga-nimittaṃ bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3030: tejaś ca dīptiś cāsmi vibhāvasau agnau |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3031: tathā jīvanaṃ sarva-bhūteṣu, yena jīvanti sarvāṇi bhūtāni tat jīvanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3032: tapaś cāsmi tapasviṣu, tasmin tapasi mayi tapasvinaḥ protāḥ ||BhGS_7.9||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3034: bījaṃ māṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3035: buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham ||BhG_7.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3036: bījaṃ praroha-kāraṇaṃ māṃ viddhi sarva-bhūtānāṃ he pārtha sanātanaṃ cirantanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3037: kiṃ ca, buddhir viveka-śaktir antaḥ-karaṇasya buddhimatāṃ viveka-śaktimatām asmi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3046: rāgo rañjanā prāpteṣu viṣayeṣu - tābhyāṃ kāma-rāgābhyāṃ vivarjitaṃ dehādi-dhāraṇa-mātrārthaṃ balaṃ sattvam aham asmi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3049: dharmeṇa śāstrārthenāviruddho yaḥ prāṇiṣu bhūteṣu kāmaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3054: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3055: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi ||BhG_7.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3056: ye caiva sāttvikāḥ sattva-nirvṛttā bhāvāḥ padārthāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3058: ye kecit prāṇināṃ sva-karma-vaśāt jāyante bhāvāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3059: tān matta eva jāyamānān iti evaṃ viddhi sarvān samastān eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3060: evaṃ yady api te matto jāyante, tathāpi na tv ahaṃ teṣu tad-adhīnas tad-vaśaḥ, yathā saṃsāriṇaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3063_1: nirguṇaṃ saṃsāra-doṣa-bīja-pradāha-kāraṇaṃ māṃ nābhijānāti jagad ity anukrośaṃ darśayati bhagavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3064: tac ca kiṃ-nimittaṃ jagato 'jñānam ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3065: tribhir guṇa-mayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3066: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam ||BhG_7.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3067: tribhir guṇa-mayaiḥ guṇa-vikāraiḥ rāga-dveṣa-mohādi-prakārair bhāvaiḥ padārthair ebhir yathoktaiḥ sarvam idaṃ prāṇi-jātaṃ jagan mohitam avivekitām āpāditaṃ san nābhijānāni mām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3068: ebhyo yathoktebhyo guṇebhyaḥ paraṃ vyatiriktaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ cāvyayaṃ vyaya-rahitaṃ janmādi-sarva-bhāva-vikāra-varjitam ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_7.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3070: kathaṃ punar daivīm etāṃ triguṇātmikāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ māyām atikrāmatīty ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3071: daivī hy eṣā guṇa-mayī mama māyā duratyayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3072: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te ||BhG_7.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3073: daivī devasya mameśvarasya viṣṇoḥ svabhāva-bhūtā hi yasmād eṣā yathoktā guṇa-mayī mama māyā duratyayā duḥkhenātyayo 'tikramaṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā duratyayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3074: tatraivaṃ sati sarva-dharmān parityajya mām eva māyāvinaṃ svātma-bhūtaṃ sarvātmanā ye prapadyante te
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3078: yadi tvāṃ prapannāḥ māyām etāṃ taranti, kasmāt tvām eva sarve na prapadyante ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3079: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3081: na māṃ parameśvaraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ duṣkṛtinaḥ pāpa-kāriṇaḥ mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamā narāṇāṃ madhye 'dhamāḥ nikṛṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3082: te ca māyayāpahṛta-jñānāḥ saṃmuṣita-jñānā āsuraṃ bhāvaṃ hiṃsānṛtādi-lakṣaṇam āśritāḥ ||BhGS_7.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3086: ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha ||BhG_7.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3087: catur-vidhāś catuḥ-prakārā bhajante sevante māṃ janāḥ sukṛtinaḥ puṇya-karmāṇo he 'rjuna |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3091: jñānī viṣṇos tattva-vic ca he bharatarṣabha ||BhGS_7.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3094: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ ||BhG_7.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3095: teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ madhye jñānī tattva-vit tattva-vittvān nitya-yukto bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3097: ataḥ sa eka-bhaktir viśiṣyate viśeṣam ādhikyam āpadyate, atiricyata ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3098: priyo hi yasmād aham ātmā jñānino 'tas tasyāham atyarthaṃ priyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3099: prasiddhaṃ hi loke ātmā priyo bhavatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3100: tasmāj jñānina ātmatvād vāsudevaḥ priyo bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3101: sa ca jñānī mama vāsudevasya ātmaiveti mamātyarthaṃ priyaḥ ||BhGS_7.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3103: na tarhy ārtādayas trayo vāsudevasya priyāḥ ? na | kiṃ tarhi ? -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3104: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3105: āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim ||BhG_7.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3108: na hi kaścin mad-bhakto vāsudevasyāpriyo bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3109: jñānī tv atyarthaṃ priyo bhavatīti viśeṣaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3110: tat kasmāt ? ity ata āha - jñānī tv ātmaiva, nānyo matta iti me mama mataṃ niścayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3111_0: āsthita āroḍhuṃ pravṛttaḥ sa jñānī hi yasmād aham eva bhagavān vāsudevo nānyo 'smīty
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3111_1: evaṃ yuktātmā samāhita-cittaḥ san mām eva paraṃ brahma gantavyam anuttamāṃ gatiṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3114: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3115: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ ||BhG_7.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3116: bahūnāṃ janmanāṃ jñānārtha-saṃskārāśrayāṇām ante samāptau jñānavān prāpta-paripāka-jñāno māṃ vāsudevaṃ pratyag-ātmānaṃ pratyakṣataḥ prapadyate |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:3347: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3348: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim ||BhG_8.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3349: om iti ekākṣaraṃ brahma brahmaṇo 'bhidhāna-bhūtam oṃkāraṃ vyāharan ucārayan,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3350: tad-artha-bhūtaṃ mām īśvaram anusmaran anucintayan yaḥ prayāti mriyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3351: sa tyajan parityajan dehaṃ śarīram - tyajan deham iti prayāṇa-viśeṣaṇārtham deha-tyāgena prayāṇam ātmanaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3352: na svarūpa-nāśenety arthaḥ - sa evaṃ yāti gacchati paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatim ||BhGS_8.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3355: ananya-cetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3357: ananya-cetā nānya-viṣaye ceto yasya so 'yam ananya-cetāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3358: yogī satataṃ sarvadā yo māṃ parameśvaraṃ smarati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3359: nityaśaḥ satatam iti nairantaryam ucyate, nityaśaḥ iti dīrgha-kālatvam ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3361: kiṃ tarhi ? yāvaj-jīvaṃ nairantaryeṇa yo māṃ smaratīty arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3362: tasya yogino 'haṃ sulabhaḥ sukhena labhyo he pārtha, nitya-yuktasya sadā samāhita-cittasya yoginaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3363: yata evam, ato 'nanya-cetāḥ san mayi sadā samāhito bhavet ||BhGS_8.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3365: tava saulabhyena kiṃ syāt ? ity ucyate | sṛṇu tan mama saulabhyena yad bhavati -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3368: mām upetya mām īśvaram upetya mad-bhāvam āpadya punar janma punar utpattiṃ nāpnuvanti na prāpnuvanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3370: iti, tad-viśeṣaṇam āha - duḥkhālayaṃ duḥkhānām ādhyātmikādīnām ālayaṃ āśrayam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3372: na kevalaṃ duḥkhālayam, aśāśvatam anavasthita-svarūpaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3373: nāpnuvanti īdṛśaṃ punar-janma mahātmāno yatayaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ mokṣākhyāṃ paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatāḥ prāptāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3374: ye punar māṃ na prāpnuvanti te punar āvartante ||BhGS_8.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3376: kiṃ punas tvatto 'nyat prāptāḥ punar āvartante ? ity ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3378: mām upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma na vidyate ||BhG_8.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3379: ā brahma-bhuvanāt bhavanty asmin bhūtānīti bhuvanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3380: brahmaṇo bhuvanaṃ brahma-bhuvanam, brahma-loka ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3381: ā brahma-bhuvanāt saha brahma-bhuvanena lokāḥ sarve punar-āvartinaḥ punar-āvartana-svabhāvāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3383: mām ekam upetya tu kaunteya punar-janma punar-utpattiḥ na vidyate ||BhGS_8.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3385: brahma-loka-sahitā lokāḥ kasmāt punar-āvartinaḥ ? kāla-paricchinnatvāt | katham ? -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3388: sahasra-yuga-paryantaṃ sahasrāṇi yugāni paryantaḥ paryavasānaṃ yasyāhnas tat ahaḥ sahasra-yuga-paryantam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3391: ke vidur ity āha - te 'ho-rātra-vidaḥ kāla-saṃkhyā-vido janā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3392: yata evaṃ kāla-paricchinnās te, ataḥ punar-āvartino lokāḥ ||BhGS_8.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3394: prajāpater ahani yad bhavati rātrau ca, tad ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3398: tasmād avyaktād vyaktayo vyajyanta iti vyaktayaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ prabhavanty abhivyajyante,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3399: ahna āgamo 'har-āgamas tasmin ahar-āgame kāle brahmaṇaḥ prabodha-kāle |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3400: tathā rātry-āgame brahmaṇaḥ svāpa-kāle pralīyante sarvā vyaktayas tatraiva pūrvokte 'vyakta-saṃjñake ||BhGS_8.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3402_1: avidyādi-kleśa-mūla-karmāśaya-vaśāc cāvaśo bhūta-grāmo bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyata ity
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3403: bhūta-grāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3405: bhūta-grāmo bhūta-samudāyaḥ sthāvara-jaṅgama-lakṣaṇo yaḥ pūrvasmin kalpa āsīt sa evāyaṃ nānyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3407: pralīyate punaḥ punaḥ rātry-āgame 'hnaḥ kṣaye 'vaśo 'svatantra eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3411: yad upanyastam akṣaram, tasya prāpty-upāyo nirdiṣṭa om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma [Gītā 8.13] ity ādinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3412: athedānīm akṣarasyaiva svarūpa-nirdidikṣayedam ucyate, anena yoga-mārgeṇedaṃ gantavyam iti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3414: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati ||BhG_8.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3419: vyatiriktatve saty api sālakṣaṇya-prasaṅgo 'stīti tad-vinivṛtty-artham āha - anya iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3423: kasmāt punaḥ paraḥ ? pūrvoktād bhūta-grāma-bīja-bhūtād avidyā-lakṣaṇād avyaktāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3425: sanātanaś cirantano yaḥ sa bhāvaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahmādiṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati ||BhGS_8.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3427: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3428: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama ||BhG_8.21||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3429: yo 'sāv avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam evākṣara-saṃjñakam avyaktaṃ bhāvam āhuḥ paramāṃ prakṛṣṭāṃ gatim |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3430: yaṃ paraṃ bhāvaṃ prāpya gatvā na nivartante saṃsārāya,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3431: tad dhāma sthānaṃ paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ mama,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3435: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3436: yasyāntaḥ-sthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam ||BhG_8.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3438: sa paraḥ pārtha, paro niratiśayaḥ, yasmāt puruṣān na paraṃ kiṃcit |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3439: sa bhaktyā labhyas tu jñāna-lakṣaṇayānanyayā ātma-viṣayayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3442: yena puruṣeṇa sarvaṃ idaṃ jagat tataṃ vyāptam ākāśeneva ghaṭādi ||BhGS_8.22||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3444: prakṛtānāṃ yogināṃ praṇavāveśita-brahma-buddhīnāṃ kālāntara-mukti-bhājāṃ brahma-pratipattaya uttaro mārgo vaktavya iti yatra kāle ity ādi vivakṣitārtha-samarpaṇārtham ucyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3446: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3447: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha ||BhG_8.23||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3448: yatra kāle prayātā iti vyavahitena saṃbandhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3449: yatra yasmin kāle tv anāvṛttim apunar-janma āvṛttiṃ tad-viparītāṃ caiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3451: karmiṇas tu guṇataḥ karma-yogena yoginām iti viśeṣaṇād yoginaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3452: yatra kāle prayātā mṛtā yogino 'nāvṛttiṃ yānti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3453: yatra kāle ca prayātāḥ āvṛttiṃ yānti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3457: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇ-māsā uttarāyaṇam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3458: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahma-vido janāḥ ||BhG_8.24||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3461: athavā, agni-jyotiṣī yathā śrute eva devate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3462: bhūyasā tu nirdeśo yatra kāle taṃ kālam iti āmra-vanavat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3465: ṣaṇ-māsā uttarāyaṇam, tatrāpi devataiva mārga-bhūtā [BAU 4.3.4] iti sthito 'nyatrāyaṃ nyāyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3466: tatra tasmin mārge prayātā mṛtā gacchanti brahma brahma-vido brahmopāsakā brahmopāsana-parā janāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3468: na hi sadyo-mukti-bhājāṃ samyag darśana-niṣṭhānāṃ gatir āgatir vā kvacid asti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3469: na tasya prāṇā utkrāmanti [BAU 4.4.6] iti śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3472: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇ-māsā dakṣiṇāyanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3473: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate ||BhG_8.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3474: dhūmo rātrir dhūmābhimāninī rātry-abhimāninī ca devatā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3476: ṣaṇ-māsā dakṣiṇāyanam iti ca pūrvavat devataiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3477: tatra candramasi bhavaṃ cāndramasaṃ jyotiḥ phalam iṣṭādi-kārī yogī karmī prāpya bhuktvā tat-kṣayād iha punar nivartate ||BhGS_8.25||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3479: śukla-kṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3481: śukla-kṛṣṇe śuklā ca kṛṣṇā ca śukla-kṛṣṇe, jñāna-prakāśakatvāt śuklā, tadabhāvāt kṛṣṇā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3482: ete śukla-kṛṣṇe hi gatī jagataḥ ity adhikṛtānāṃ jñāna-karmaṇoḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3483: na jagataḥ sarvasyaiva ete gatī saṃbhavataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3485: tatraikayā śuklayā yāty anāvṛttim, anyayā itarayā āvartate punar bhūyaḥ ||BhGS_8.26||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3487: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3489: na ete yathokte sṛtī mārgau pārtha jānan saṃsārāya ekā, anyā mokṣāyeti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3490: yogī na muhyati kaścana kaścid api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3491: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yoga-yuktaḥ samāhito bhavārjuna ||BhGS_8.27||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3498: vedeṣu samyag-adhīteṣu yajñeṣu ca sādguṇyenānutiṣṭhiteṣu tapaḥsu ca sutapteṣu dāneṣu ca samyag-datteṣu yad eteṣu puṇya-phalaṃ puṇyasya phalaṃ puṇya-phalaṃ pradiṣṭaṃ śāstreṇa,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3499: atyety atītya gacchati sat sarvaṃ phala-jātam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3500: idaṃ viditvā sapta-praśna-nirṇaya-dvāreṇoktam arthaṃ samyag avadhāryānuṣṭhāya yogī paraṃ prakṛṣṭam aiśvaraṃ sthānam upaiti ca pratipadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3501: ādyam ādau bhavaṃ kāraṇaṃ brahmety arthaḥ ||BhGS_8.28||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3512: tasya ca phalam agny-arcir-ādi-krameṇa kālāntare brahma-prāpti-lakṣaṇam evānāvṛtti-rūpaṃ nirdiṣṭam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3514: nānyathā iti tad āśaṅkā-vyāvivartayiṣayā śrī-bhagavān uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3515: idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3517: idaṃ brahma-jñānaṃ vakṣyamāṇam uktaṃ ca pūrveṣu adhyāyeṣu, tat buddhau saṃnidhīkṛtya idam ity āha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3519: idam eva tu samyag-jñānaṃ sākṣāt mokṣa-prāpti-sādhanam vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti [Gītā 7.12],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3520: ātmaivedaṃ sarvam [ChāU 7.25.2] ekam evādvitīyam [ChāU 6.2.1] ity ādi-śruti-smṛtibhyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3522: atha te ye 'nyathāto vidur anya-rājānas te kṣayya-lokā bhavanti [ChāU 7.25.2] ity ādi-śrutibhyaś ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3523: te tubhyaṃ guhyatamaṃ gopyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmi kathayiṣyāmy anasūyave 'sūyā-rahitāya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3526: vijñāna-sahitam anubhava-yuktam, yaj jñātvā prāpya mokṣyase 'śubhāt saṃsāra-bandhanāt ||BhGS_9.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3534: pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ idam uttamaṃ sarveṣāṃ pāvanānāṃ śuddhi-kāraṇaṃ brahma-jñānam utkṛṣṭatamam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3535: aneka-janma-sahasra-saṃcitam api dharmādharmādi sa-mūlaṃ karma kṣaṇa-mātrād eva bhasmīkarotīty ataḥ kiṃ tasya pāvanatvaṃ vaktavyam ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3536: kiṃ ca - pratyakṣāvagamaṃ pratyakṣeṇa sukhāder ivāvagamo yasya tat pratyakṣāvagamam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3540: evam api, syād duḥkha-saṃpādyam ity ata āha - susukhaṃ kartum, yathā ratna-viveka-vijñānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3543: idaṃ tu sukha-saṃpādyatvāt phala-kṣayāt vyetīti prāpte,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3551: aśraddadhānāḥ śraddhā-virahitā ātma-jñānasya dharmasyāsya svarūpe tat-phale ca nāstikāḥ pāpa-kāriṇaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3555: mat-prāptau naivāśaṅketi mat-prāpti-mārga-bheda-bhakti-mātram apy aprāpya ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3563: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyakta-mūrtinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3564: mat-sthāni sarva-bhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ ||BhG_9.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3565: mayā mama yaḥ paro bhāvas tena tataṃ vyāptaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagad avyakta-mūrtinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3566: na vyaktā mūrtiḥ svarūpaṃ yasya mama so 'ham avyakta-mūrtis tena mayāvyakta-mūrtinā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3568: tasmin mayy avyakta-mūrtau sthitāni mat-sthāni, sarva-bhūtāni brahmādīni stamba-paryantāni |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3569: na hi nirātmakaṃ kiṃcit bhūtaṃ vyavahārāyāvakalpate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3572: teṣāṃ bhūtānām aham evātmā ity atas teṣu sthita iti mūḍha-buddhīnām avabhāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3573: ato bravīmi - na cāhaṃ teṣu bhūteṣv avasthitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3574: mūrtavat saṃśleṣābhāvena ākāśasyāpy antaratamo hy aham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3575: na hy asaṃsargi vastu kvacit ādheya-bhāvenāvasthitaṃ bhavati ||BhGS_9.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3578: na ca mat-sthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3579: bhūta-bhṛn na ca bhūta-stho mamātmā bhūta-bhāvanaḥ ||BhG_9.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3581: paśya me yogaṃ yuktiṃ ghaṭānaṃ me mama aiśvaram īśvarasyemam aiśvaram,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3583: tathā ca śrutir asaṃsargitvād asaṅgatāṃ darśayati - asaṅgo na hi sajjate [BAU 3.9.26] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3584: idaṃ cāścaryam anyat paśya - bhūta-bhṛd asaṅgo 'pi san bhūtāni bibharti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3588: vibhajya dehādi-saṅghātaṃ tasminn ahaṃkāram adhyāropya loka-buddhim anusaran vyapadiśati mamātmeti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3589: na punar ātmana ātmānya iti lokavad ajānan |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3590: tathā bhūta-bhāvano bhūtāni bhāvayaty utpādayati vardhayatīti vā bhūta-bhāvanaḥ ||BhGS_9.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3595: yathā loke ākāśa-sthita ākāśe sthito nityaṃ sadā vāyuḥ sarvatra gacchatīti sarvatra-go mahān parimāṇataḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3596: tathā ākāśavat sarva-gate mayy asaṃśleṣeṇaiva sthitānīty evam upadhāraya vijānīhi ||BhGS_9.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3598: evaṃ vāyur ākāśe iva mayi sthitāni sarva-bhūtāni sthiti-kāle | tāni -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3600: kalpa-kṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham ||BhG_9.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3601: sarva-bhūtāni kaunteya prakṛtiṃ triguṇātmikām aparāṃ nikṛṣṭaṃ yānti māmikāṃ madīyāṃ kalpa-kṣaye pralaya-kāle |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3602: punar bhūyas tāni bhūtāni utpatti-kāle kalpādau visṛjāmi utpādayāmy ahaṃ pūrvavat ||BhGS_9.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3605: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3606: bhūta-grāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt ||BhG_9.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3607: prakṛtiṃ svāṃ svīyām avaṣṭabhya vaśīkṛtya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ prakṛtito jātaṃ bhūta-grāmaṃ bhūta-samudāyam imaṃ vartamānaṃ kṛtsnam avaśam asvatantram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3611: tarhi tasya te parameśvarasya bhūta-grāmam imaṃ viṣamaṃ vidadhataḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3612: tan-nimittābhyāṃ dharmādharmābhyāṃ saṃbandhaḥ syād itīdam āha bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3613: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3615: na ca mām īśvaraṃ tāni bhūta-grāmasya viṣama-sarga-nimittāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3616: tatra karmaṇām asaṃbandhitve kāraṇam āha - udāsīnavat āsīnaṃ yathā udīsīna upekṣakaḥ kaścit tadvad āsīnam ātmano 'vikriyatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3617: asaktaṃ phalāsaṅga-rahitam, abhimāna-varjitam, ahaṃ karomīti teṣu karmasu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:3619: anyathā karmabhir badhyate mūḍhaḥ kośa-kāravad ity abhiprāyaḥ ||BhGS_9.9||

GSP33bhgsbh_u:4786: ahaṃ paramaḥ parā gatir yasya so 'yaṃ mat-paramaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4787: tathā mad-bhakto mām eva sarva-prakāraiḥ sarva-prakāraiḥ sarvātmanā sarvotsāhena bhajate iti mad-bhaktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4788: saṅga-varjito dhana-putra-mitra-kalatra-bandhu-vargeṣu saṅga-varjitaḥ saṅgaḥ prītiḥ snehas tad-varjitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4789: nirvairo nirgata-vairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu śatru-bhāva-rahita ātmano ' tyantāpakāra-pravṛtteṣv api |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4790: ya īdṛśo mad-bhaktaḥ sa mām eti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4791: aham eva tasya parā gatiḥ, nānyā gatiḥ kācit bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4801: dvitīyādhyāya-prabhṛtiṣu vibhūty-anteṣu adhyāyeṣu paramātmano brahmaṇo 'kṣarasya vidhvasta-sarvopādhi-viśeṣasyopāsanam uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4803: viśva-rūpādhyāye tv aiśvaram ādyaṃ samasta-jagad-ātma-rūpaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ tvadīyaṃ darśitam upāsanārtham eva tvayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4804: tac ca darśayitvā uktavān asi mat-karma-kṛd [Gītā 11.55] ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4805: ato 'ham anayor ubhayoḥ pakṣayor viśiṣṭatara-bubhutsayā tvāṃ pṛcchāmīty arjuna uvāca -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4806: evaṃ satata-yuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4807: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yoga-vittamāḥ ||BhG_12.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4808: evam ity atītānantara-lokena uktam arthaṃ parāmṛśati mat-karma-kṛd ity ādinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4810: nairantaryeṇa bhagavat-karmādau yathokte 'rthe samāhitāḥ santaḥ pravṛttā ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4811: ye bhaktā ananya-śaraṇāḥ santas tvāṃ yathā-darśitaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ paryupāsate dhyāyanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4812: ye cānye 'pi tyakta-sarveṣaṇāḥ saṃnyasta-sarva-karmāṇo yathā-viśeṣitaṃ brahmākṣaraṃ nirasta-sarvopādhitvād avyaktam akaraṇa-gocaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4813: yad dhi karaṇa-gocaraṃ tad vyaktam ucyate, añjer dhātos tat-karmakatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4820: śrī-bhagavān uvāca - ye tv akṣaropāsakāḥ samyag-darśino nivṛttaiṣaṇās te tāvat tiṣṭhantu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4821: tān prati yad vaktavyam, tad upariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ | ye tv itare -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4822: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nitya-yuktā upāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4823: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ ||BhG_12.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4824: mayi viśva-rūpe parameśvara āveśya samādhāya mano ye bhaktāḥ santaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4825: māṃ sarva-yoge varāṇām adhīśvaraṃ sarvajñaṃ vimukta-rāgādi-kleśa-timira-dṛṣṭim,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4826: nitya-yuktā atītānantarādhyāyāntokta-ślokārtha-nyāyena satata-yuktāḥ santa upāsate śraddhayā parayā prakṛṣṭayopetāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4827: te me mama matā abhipretā yuktatamā iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4829: ato yuktaṃ tān prati yuktatamā iti vaktum ||BhGS_12.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4831: kim itare yuktatamā na bhavanti ? na | kiṃtu tān prati yad vaktavyam, tac chṛṇu -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4832: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4833: sarvatra-gam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam ||BhG_12.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4834: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam, avyaktatvād aśabda-gocareti na nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyate, ato 'nirdeśyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4835: avyaktaṃ na kenāpi pramāṇena vyajyata ity avyaktaṃ paryupāsate pari samantād upāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4836: upāsanaṃ nāma yathā-śāstram upāsyasyārthasya viṣayī-karaṇena sāmīpyam upagamya taila-dhārāvat samāna-pratyaya-pravāheṇa dīrgha-kālaṃ yad āsanam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4838: akṣarasya viśeṣaṇam āha - sarvatra-gaṃ vyomavad vyāpy acintyaṃ cāvyaktatvād acintyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4843: kūṭa-rūpam kūṭa-sākṣyam ity ādau kūṭa-śabdaḥ prasiddho loke |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4844: tathā cāvidyādy-aneka-saṃsāra-bījam antar-doṣavan māyā-vyākṛtādi-śabda-vācyatayā māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4846: mama māyā duratyayā [Gītā 7.14] ity ādau prasiddhaṃ yat tat kūṭam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4848: athavā, rāśir iva sthitaṃ kūṭa-stham ata evācalam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4849: yasmād acalam, tasmād dhruvam, nityam ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_12.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4852: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ ||BhG_12.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4853: saṃniyamya samyak niyamya upasaṃhṛtya indriya-grāmam indriya-samudāyaṃ sarvatra sarvasmin kāle sama-buddhayaḥ samā tulyā buddhir yeṣām iṣṭāniṣṭa-prāptau te sama-buddhayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4854: te ye evaṃ-vidhās te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarva-bhūta-hite ratāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4855: na tu teṣāṃ vaktavyaṃ kiṃcit māṃ te prāpnuvantīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4856: jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam iti hy uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4857: na hi bhagavat-svarūpāṇāṃ satāṃ yuktatamatvam ayuktatamatvaṃ vā vācyam ||BhGS_12.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4861: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate ||BhG_12.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4865: avyaktāsakta-cetasām avyakta āsaktaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ te 'vyaktāsakta-cetasas teṣām avyaktāsakta-cetasām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4866: avyaktā hi yasmād yā gatir akṣarātmikā duḥkhaṃ sā dehavadbhir dehābhimānavadbhir avāpyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4868: akṣaropāsakānāṃ yad vartanam, tad upariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ ||BhGS_12.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4870: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mat-parāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4872_0: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayīśvare saṃnyasya mat-parā ahaṃ paro yeṣāṃ te mat-parāḥ santo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4872_1: 'nanyenaivāvidyamānam anyat ālambanaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ devam ātmānaṃ muktvā yasya so 'nanyas tenānanyenaiva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4873: kena ? yogena samādhinā māṃ dhyāyantaś cintayanta upāsate ||BhGS_12.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4880: ity āha - mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarān mṛtyu-yuktaḥ saṃsāro mṛtyu-saṃsāraḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4883: tasmāt mṛtyu-saṃsāra-sāgarāt ahaṃ teṣāṃ samuddhartā bhavāmi na cirāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4886: mayi āveśita-cetasāṃ mayi viśva-rūpa āveśitaṃ samāhitaṃ ceto yeṣāṃ te mayy āveśita-cetasas teṣām ||BhGS_12.7||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4889: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4890: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ ||BhG_12.8||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4891: mayy eva viśva-rūpa īśvare manaḥ saṃkalpa-vikalpātmakaṃ ādhatsva sthāpaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4892: mayy evādhyavasāyaṃ kurvatīṃ buddhim ādhatsva niveśaya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4893: tatas te kiṃ syād iti sṛṇu - nivasiṣyasi nivatsyasi niścayena mad-ātmanā mayi nivāsaṃ kariṣyasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4897: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4899: atha evaṃ yathāvocaṃ tathā mayi cittaṃ samādhātuṃ sthāpayituṃ sthiram acalaṃ na śaknoṣi cet,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4901: cittasyaikasmin ālambane sarvataḥ samāhṛtya punaḥ punaḥ sthāpanam abhyāsaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4902: tat-pūrvako yogaḥ samādhāna-lakṣaṇas tenābhyāsa-yogena māṃ viśva-rūpam iccha prārthayasva āptuṃ prāptum |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4906: mad-artham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi ||BhG_12.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4908: tarhi mat-karma-paramo bhava mad-arthaṃ karma mat-karma tat-paramaḥ mat-karma-paramaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4910: abhyāsena vinā mad-artham api karmāṇi kevalaṃ kurvan siddhiṃ sattva-śuddhi-yoga-jñāna-prāpti-dvāreṇāvāpsyasi ||BhGS_12.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4912: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ mad-yogam āśritaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4914: atha punar etad api yad uktaṃ mat-karma-paramatvam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4917: āśrito mayi kriyamāṇāni karmāṇi saṃnyasya yat karaṇaṃ teṣām anuṣṭhānaṃ sa mad-yogaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4919: sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ phala-saṃnyāsaṃ sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ tato 'nantaraṃ kuru yatātmavān saṃyata-cittaḥ san ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_12.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4922: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4926: tasmād api jñānāj jñāna-pūrvakaṃ dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4927: jñānavato dhyānād api karma-phala-tyāgo viśiṣyata ity anuṣajyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4928: evaṃ karma-phala-tyāgāt pūrva-viśeṣaṇavataḥ śāntir upaśamaḥ sa-hetukasya saṃsārasyānantaram eva syāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4930: ajñasya karmaṇi pravṛttasya pūrvopadiṣṭopāyānuṣṭhānāśaktau sarva-karmaṇāṃ phala-tyāgaḥ śreyaḥ-sādhanam upadiṣṭam, na prathamam eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4931: ataś ca śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsād ity uttarottara-viśiṣṭatvopadeśena sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaḥ stūyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4933: kena sādharmyeṇa stutitvam ? yadā sarve pramucyanta iti sarva-kāma-prahāṇād amṛtatvam uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4936: tat-tyāge ca viduṣo dhyāna-niṣṭhasyānantaraiva śāntir iti sarva-kāma-tyāga-sāmānyam ajña-karma-phala-tyāgasyāstīti tat-sāmānyāt sarva-karma-phala-tyāga-stutir iyaṃ prarocanārthā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4937: yathāgastyena brāhmaṇena samudraḥ pīta itīdānīṃtanā api brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇatva-sāmānyāt stūyante,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4941: atra cātmeśvara-bhedam āśritya viśva-rūpa īśvare cetaḥ-samādhāna-lakṣaṇo yoga uktaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4943: athaitad apy aśakto 'si [Gītā 12.11] ity ajñāna-kārya-sūcanān nābheda-darśino 'kṣaropāsakasya karma-yoga upapadyata iti darśayati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4945: te prāpnuvanti mām eva [Gītā 12.4] ity akṣaropāsakānāṃ kaivalya-prāptau svātantryam uktvā,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4946: itareṣāṃ pāratantryād īśvarādhīnatāṃ darśitavān teṣām ahaṃ samuddhartā [Gītā 12.7] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4948: akṣara-svarūpā eva ta iti samuddharaṇa-karma-vacanaṃ tān praty apeśalaṃ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4949: yasmāc cārjunasyātyantam eva hitaiṣī bhagavān tasya samyag-darśanānanvitaṃ karma-yogaṃ bheda-dṛṣṭimantam eva upadiśati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4951: buddhvā kasyacid guṇa-bhāvaṃ jigamiṣati kaścid, virodhāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4952: tasmād akṣaropāsakānāṃ samyag darśana-niṣṭhānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ tyakta-sarveṣaṇānām adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādi-dharma-pūgaṃ sākṣād amṛtatva-kāraṇaṃ vakṣyāmīti pravartate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4953: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4956: ātmano duḥkha-hetum api na kiṃcid dveṣṭi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4958: maitro mitra-bhāvo maitrī mitratayā vartata iti maitraḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4966: sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ same duḥkha-sukhe dveṣa-rāgayor apravartake yasya sa sama-duḥkha-sukhaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4970: mayy arpita-mano-buddhir yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||BhG_12.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4971: saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataṃ nityaṃ deha-sthiti-kāraṇasya lābhe 'lābhe ca utpannālaṃ-pratyayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4975: dṛḍha-niścayo dṛḍhaḥ sthiro niścayo 'dhyavasāyo yasyātma-tattva-viṣaye sa dṛḍha-niścayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4978: te mayy evārpite sthāpite yasya saṃnyāsinaḥ sa mayy arpita-mano-buddhiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4979: ya īdṛśo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4980: priyo hi jñānino 'ty artham ahaṃ sa ca mama priya iti saptame 'dhyāye sūcitam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4983: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4984: harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ ||BhG_12.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4985: yasmāt saṃnyāsino nodvijate nodvegaṃ gacchati na santapyate na saṃkṣubhyati lokaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4987: harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair harṣaś cāmarṣaś ca bhayaṃ codvegaś ca tair harṣāmarṣa-bhayodvegair muktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4992: tair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ ||BhGS_12.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4995: sarvārambha-parityāgī yo mad-bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||BhG_12.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4997: śucir bāhyena ābhyantareṇa ca śaucena saṃpannaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4998: dakṣaḥ pratyutpanneṣu kāryeṣu sadyo yathāvat pratipattuṃ samarthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:4999: udāsīno na kasyacit mitrādeḥ pakṣaṃ bhajate yaḥ, sa udāsīno yatiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5003: tān parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti sarvārambha-parityāgī yaḥ mad-bhaktaḥ saḥ me priyaḥ ||BhGS_12.16||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5006: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5007: śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||BhG_12.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5012: śubhāśubhe karmaṇī parityaktuṃ śīlam asyeti śubhāśubha-parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ ||BhGS_12.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5014: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāpamānayoḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5016: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca, tathā mānāpamānayoḥ pūjā-paribhavayoḥ, śītoṣṇa-sukha-duḥkheṣu samaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5021: aniketaḥ sthira-matir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ ||BhG_12.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5026: saṃtuṣṭaḥ yena kenacit śarīra-sthiti-hetu-mātreṇa | tathā coktam -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5027: yena kenacid ācchanno yena kenacid āśitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5028: yatra kvacana śāyī syāt taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ || [Mbh 12.245.12] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5030: aniketo niketa āśrayo nivāso niyato na vidyate yasya so 'niketaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5032: sthira-matiḥ sthirā paramārtha-viṣayā yasya matiḥ saḥ sthira-matiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5035: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām [Gītā 12.13] ity ādinākṣaropāsakānāṃ nivṛtta-sarveṣaṇānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ paramārtha-jñāna-niṣṭhānāṃ dharma-jātaṃ prakrāntam upasaṃhriyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5036: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5037: śraddadhānā mat-paramā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ ||BhG_12.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5038: ye tu saṃnyāsino dharmyāmṛtaṃ dharmād anapetaṃ dharmyaṃ ca tad amṛtaṃ ca tat,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5041: adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānām ity ādinā paryupāsate 'nutiṣṭhanti śraddadhānāḥ santaḥ mat-paramāḥ yathokto 'ham akṣarātmā paramo niratiśayā gatir yeṣāṃ te mat-paramāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5044: priyo hi jñānino 'ty artham [Gītā 7.18] iti yat sūcitaṃ tat vyākhyāyehopasaṃhṛtam bhaktās te 'tīva me priyā iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5045: yasmād dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktam anutiṣṭhan bhagavato viṣṇoḥ parameśvarasyātīva priyo bhavati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5046: tasmād idaṃ dharmyāmṛtaṃ mumukṣuṇā yatnato 'nuṣṭheyaṃ viṣṇoḥ priyaṃ paraṃ dhāma jigamiṣuṇeti vākyārthaḥ ||BhGS_12.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5052: [*NOTE: Numbering of this adhyaya out of tune with standard editions
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5057: saptame 'dhyāye sūcite dve prakṛtī īśvarasya triguṇātmikāṣṭadhā bhinnāparā saṃsāra-hetutvāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5060: tatra kṣetra-kṣetrajña-lakṣaṇa-prakṛti-dvaya-nirūpaṇa-dvāreṇa tadvata īśvarasya tattva-nirdhāraṇārthaṃ kṣetrādhyāya ārabhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5061: atītānantarādhyāye ca adveṣṭā sarva-bhūtānāṃ [Gītā 12.13] ity ādinā yāvad-adhyāya-parisamāptis tāvat tattva-jñānināṃ sannyāsināṃ niṣṭhā yathā te vartanta ity etad uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5062: kena punas te tattva-jñānena yuktā yathokta-dharmācaraṇād bhagavataḥ priyā bhavanty evam arthaś cāyam adhyāya ārabhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5063: prakṛtiś ca triguṇātmikā sarva-kārya-karaṇa-viṣayākāreṇa pariṇatā puruṣasya bhogāpavargārtha-kartavyatayā
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5064: dehendriyādyākāreṇa saṃhanyate | so 'yaṃ saṅghāta idaṃ śarīram | tad etad bhagavān uvāca --
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5065: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5066: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tad-vidaḥ ||BhG_13.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5067: idam iti sarva-nāmnoktaṃ viśinaṣṭi śariram iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5068: he kaunteya ! kṣata-trāṇāt kṣayāt kṣaraṇāt, kṣetravad vāsmin karma-phala-niṣpatteḥ kṣetram iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5071: etac charīraṃ kṣetraṃ yo vetti vijānāti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5074: taṃ veditāraṃ prāhuḥ kathayanti kṣetrajña iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5077: ke ? tad-vidas tau kṣetra-kṣetrajñau ye vidanti te tad-vidaḥ ||BhGS_13.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5079: evaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajñau uktau | kim etāvan-mātreṇa jñānena jñātavyau? iti nety ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5080: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarva-kṣetreṣu bhārata |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5081: kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama ||BhG_13.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5082: kṣetrajñaṃ yathokta-lakṣaṇaṃ cāpi māṃ parameśvaram asaṃsāriṇaṃ viddhi jānīhi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5085: he bhārata ! yasmāt kṣetra-kṣetrajñeśvara-yāthātmya-vyatirekeṇa na jñāna-gocaram anyad avaśiṣṭam asti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5086: tasmāt kṣetra-kṣetrajñayor jñeya-bhūtayor yaj jñānaṃ kṣetra-kṣetrajñau yena jñānena viṣayīkriyete,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5087: taj jñānaṃ samyag-jñānam iti matam abhiprāyaḥ mameśvarasya viṣṇoḥ ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5089: nānyas tad-vyatirikto bhoktā vidyate cet, tata īśvarasya saṃsāritvaṃ prāptam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5099: dūram ete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyeti jñātā [KaṭhU 1.2.4] tathā tayor vidyāvidyā-viṣayayoḥ phala-bhedo 'pi viruddho nirdiṣṭaḥ - śreyaś ca preyaś ca [KaṭhU 1.2.2] iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5100: vidyā-viṣayaḥ śreyaḥ, preyas tv avidyā-kāryam iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5102: imāv atha panthānau [Mbh 12.241.6] ity ādi, imau dvāv eva panthānāv ity ādi ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5104: avidyā ca saha kāryeṇa vidyayā hātavyeti śruti-smṛti-nyāyebhyo 'vagamyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5105: śrutayas tāvat - iha ced avedīd atha satyam asti na ced ihāvedīn mahatī vinaṣṭiḥ [KenaU 2.5],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5106: tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati [TaittĀ 3.12],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5107: nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya [ŚvetU 3.8] vidvān na bibheti kutaścana [TaittU 2.9] |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5108: aviduṣas tu - atha tasya bhayaṃ bhavati [TaittU 2.7],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5111: anyo 'sāv anyo 'ham asmīti na sa veda yathā paśur evaṃ sa devānām [BAU 1.4.10] |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5112: ātmavid yaḥ sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati [BAU 1.4.10], yadā carmavat [ŚvetU 6.20] ity ādyāḥ sahasraśaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5113: smṛtayaś ca - ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ [Gītā 5.25],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5114: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ [Gītā 5.19],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5115: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra [Gītā 13.29] ity ādyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5121: tathā ca - dehādiṣu ātma-buddhir avidvān rāga-dveṣādi-prayukto dharmādharmānuṣṭhāna-kṛj jāyate mriyate cety avagamyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5122: dehādi-vyatiriktātma-darśino rāga-dveṣādi-prahāṇāpekṣa-dharmādharma-pravṛtty-upaśamān mucyanta iti na kenacit pratyākhyātuṃ śakyaṃ nyāyataḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5126: sarva-jantūnāṃ hi prasiddho dehādiṣv anātmasu ātma-bhāvo niścito 'vidyā-kṛtaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5128: na caitāvatā puruṣa-dharmaḥ sthāṇor bhavati, sthāṇu-dharmo vā puruṣasya |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5130: deha-dharmo vā cetanasya sukha-duḥkha-mohātmakatvādir ātmano na yuktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5133: iti cet - sthāṇu-puruṣau jñeyāv eva santau jñātrānyonyasminn adhyastāv avidyayā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5134: dehātmanos tu jñeya-jñātror eva itaretarādhyāsaḥ, iti na samo dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5135: ato deha-dharmo jñeyo 'pi jñātur ātmano bhavatīti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5137: yadi hi jñeyasya dehādeḥ kṣetrasya dharmāḥ sukha-duḥkha-mohecchādayo jñātur bhavanti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5139: jñeyasya kṣetrasya dharmāḥ kecit ātmano bhavanty avidyādhyāropitāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5140: jarā-maraṇādayas tu na bhavantīti viśeṣa-hetur vaktavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5141: na bhavantīty asty anumānam - avidyādhyāropitatvāj jarā-maraṇādivad iti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5145: kartṛtva-bhoktṛtva-lakṣaṇaḥ saṃsāro jñeya-stho jñātary avidyayādhyāropita iti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5149: sarva-kṣetreṣv api sato bhagavataḥ kṣetrajñasyeśvarasya saṃsāritva-gandha-mātram api nāśaṅkayam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5150: na hi kvacid api loke 'vidyādhyastena dharmeṇa kasyacid upakāro 'pakāro vā dṛṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5151: yat tūktam - na samo dṛṣṭānta iti, tad asat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5152: katham ? avidyādhyāsa-mātraṃ hi dṛṣṭānta-dārṣṭāntikayoḥ sādharmyaṃ vivakṣitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5154: yat tu jñātari vyabhicaratīti manyase, tasyāpy anaikāntikatvaṃ darśitaṃ jarādibhiḥ ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5155: avidyāvattvāt kṣetrajñasya saṃsāritvam iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5160: viveka-prakāśa-bhāve tad-abhāvāt tāmase cāvaraṇātmake timirādi-doṣe saty agrahaṇāder avidyā-trayasya upalabdheḥ ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5164: yat tu manyase - jñātṛ-dharmo 'vidyā, tad eva cāvidyā-dharmavattvaṃ kṣetrajñasya saṃsāritvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5165: tatra yad uktam īśvara eva kṣetrajñaḥ, na saṃsārīty etad ayuktam iti, tan na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5167: na viparītādi-grahaṇaṃ tan-nimittaṃ vā taimirikatvādi-doṣo grahītuḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5168: cakṣuṣaḥ saṃskāreṇa timire 'panīte grahītur adarśanān na grahītur dharmo yathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5169: tathā sarvatraivāgrahaṇa-viparīta-saṃśaya-pratyayās tan-nimittāḥ karaṇasyaiva kasyacit bhavitum arhanti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5171: saṃvedyatvāc ca teṣāṃ pradīpa-prakāśavan na jñātṛ-dharmatvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5175: ātmano yadi kṣetrajñasyāgny-uṣṇavat svo dharmaḥ, tato na kadācid api tena viyogaḥ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5176: avikriyasya ca vyomavat sarva-gatasyāmūrtasya ātmanaḥ kenacit saṃyoga-viyogānupapatteḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5179: nanv evaṃ sati saṃsāra-saṃsāritvābhāve śāstrānarthakyādi-doṣaḥ syād iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5181: sarvair hy ātma-vādibhir abhyupagato doṣo naikena parihartavyo bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5183: muktātmanāṃ hi saṃsāra-saṃsāritva-vyavahārābhāvaḥ sarvair eva ātma-vādibhir iṣyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5185: tathā naḥ kṣetrajñānām īśvaraikatve sati, śāstrānarthakyaṃ bhavatu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5186: avidyā-viṣaye cārthavattvam - yathā dvaitināṃ sarveṣāṃ bandhāvasthāyām eva śāstrādy-arthavattvam,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5188: nanv ātmano bandha-muktāvasthe paramārthata eva vastu-bhūte dvaitināṃ sarveṣām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5195: yadi tāvat ātmano bandha-muktāvasthe, yugapat syātām, krameṇa vā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5196: yugapat tāvat virodhān na saṃbhavataḥ sthiti-gatī ivaikasmin |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5197: krama-bhāvitve ca, nirnimittatvaṃ sa-nimittatvaṃ vā ? nirnimittatve 'nirmokṣa-prasaṅgaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5205: na cāvasthāvato 'vasthāntaraṃ gacchato nityatvam upapādayituṃ śakyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5210: aviduṣāṃ hi phala-hetvor anātmanor ātma-darśanam, na viduṣām |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5211: viduṣāṃ hi phala-hetubhyām ātmano 'nyatva-darśane sati, tayor aham ity ātma-darśanānupapatteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5212: na hy atyanta-mūḍha unmattādir api jalāgnyoś chāyā-prakāśayor vaikātmyaṃ paśyati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5214: tasmān na vidhi-pratiṣedha-śāstraṃ tāvat phala-hetubhyām ātmano 'nyatva-darśino bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5216: tvam idaṃ kuru” iti kasmiṃścit karmaṇi niyukte,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5217: “viṣṇumitro 'haṃ niyuktaḥ” iti tatra-stho niyogaṃ sṛṇvann api pratipadyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5220: nanu prākṛta-saṃbandhāpekṣayā yuktaiva pratipattiḥ śāstrārtha-viṣayā - phala-hetubhyām anyātma-viṣaya-darśane 'pi sati - iṣṭa-phala-hetau pravartito 'smi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5222: yathā pitṛ-putrādīnām itaretarātmānyatva-darśane saty apy anyonya-niyoga-pratiṣedhārtha-pratipattiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5224: vyatiriktātma-darśana-pratipatteḥ prāg eva phala-hetvor ātmābhimānasya siddhatvāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5225: pratipanna-niyoga-pratiṣedhārtho hi phala-hetubhyām ātmano 'nyatvaṃ pratipadyate, na pūrvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5227: nanu svarga-kāmo yajeta [Ap.Śr.S. 10.2.1] na kalañjaṃ bhakṣayed ity ādāv ātma-vyatireka-darśinām apravṛttau,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5229: ataḥ kartur abhāvāc chāstrānarthakyam iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5232: tathā nairātmyavādy api nāsti para-loka iti na pravartate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5233: yathā-prasiddhitas tu vidhi-pratiṣedha-śāstra-śravaṇānyathānupapattyānumitātmāstitva ātma-viśeṣānabhijñaḥ karma-phala-saṃjāta-tṛṣṇaḥ śraddadhānatayā ca pravartate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5236: vivekinām apravṛtti-darśanāt tad-anugāminām apravṛttau śāstrānarthakyam iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5238: anekeṣu hi prāṇiṣu kaścid eva vivekī syāt, yathedānīm |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5243: svabhāvas tu pravartate [Gītā 5.14] iti hi uktam ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5246: na ca mithyā-jñānaṃ paramārtha-vastu dūṣayituṃ samartham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5247: na hy ūṣara-deśaṃ snehena paṅkī-kartuṃ śaknoti marīcy-udakam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5248: tathāvidyā kṣetrajñasya na kiṃcit kartuṃ śaknoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5249: ataś cedam uktam - kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5251: atha kim idaṃ saṃsāriṇām ivāham evam mamaivedam iti paṇḍitānām api ? sṛṇu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5252: idaṃ tat pāṇḍityam, yat kṣetra evātma-darśanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5253: yadi punaḥ kṣetrajñam avikriyaṃ paśyeyus tato na bhogaṃ karma vākāṅkṣeyur mama syād iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5256: viduṣaḥ punar avikriyātma-darśinaḥ phalārthitvābhāvāt pravṛtty-anupapattau kārya-karaṇa-saṃghāta-vyāpāroparame nivṛttir upacaryate ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5257: idaṃ cānyat pāṇḍityaṃ kasyacid astu - kṣetrajña īśvara eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5259: ahaṃ tu saṃsārī sukhī duḥkhī ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5261: dhyānena ceśvaraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ sākṣāt kṛtvā tat-svarūpāvasthāneneti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5262: yaś caivaṃ budhyate, yaś ca bodhayati, nāsau kṣetrajña iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5265: ātmahā svayaṃ mūḍho 'nyāṃ ca vyāmohayati śāstrārtha-saṃpradāya-rahitatvāt,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5267: tasmāt asaṃpradāya-vit sarva-śāstra-vid api mūrkhavad eva upekṣaṇīyaḥ ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5268: yat tūktam īśvarasya kṣetrajñaikatve saṃsāritvaṃ prāpnoti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5270: etau doṣau pratyuktau vidyāvidyayor vailakṣaṇyābhyupagamād iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5271: katham ? avidyā-parikalpita-doṣeṇa tad-viṣayaṃ vastu pāramārthikaṃ na duṣyatīti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5272: tathā ca dṛṣṭanto darśitaḥ - marīcy-ambhasā ūṣara-deśo na paṅkīkriyata iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5275: tat-kṛtaṃ ca sukhitva-duḥkhitvādi pratyakṣam upalabhyate iti cet, na |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5277: yāvat kiṃcit kṣetrajñasya doṣa-jātam avidyamānam āsañjayasi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5280: na ca tena kṣetrajño duṣyati, jñeyena jñātuḥ saṃsargānupapatteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5281: yadi hi saṃsargaḥ syāt, jñeyatvam eva nopapadyeta |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5282: yady ātmano dharmo 'vidyāvattvaṃ duḥkhitvādi ca kathaṃ bhoḥ pratyakṣam upalabhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5284: jñeyaṃ ca sarvaṃ kṣetraṃ jñātaiva kṣetrajña ity avadhārite,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5285: avidyā-duḥkhitvādeḥ kṣetrajña-viśeṣaṇatvaṃ kṣetrajña-dharmatvaṃ tasya ca pratyakṣopalabhyatvam iti viruddham ucyate 'vidyā-mātrāvaṣṭambhāt
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5290: atrocyate - avidyā kasya dṛśyate iti praśno nirarthakaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5291: katham ? dṛśyate ced avidyā, tadvantam api paśyasi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5292: na ca tadvaty upalabhyamāne sā kasya ? iti praśno yuktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5293: na hi gomati upalabhyamāne gāvaḥ kasya ? iti praśno 'rthavān bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5295: gavāṃ tadvataś ca pratyakṣatvāt tat-saṃbandho 'pi pratyakṣa iti praśno nirarthakaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5296: na tathāvidyā tadvāṃś ca pratyakṣau, yataḥ praśno nirarthakaḥ syāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5301: jānāsi tarhy avidyāṃ tadvantaṃ ca ātmānam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5304: na hi tava jñātuḥ jñeya-bhūtayāvidyayā tat-kāle saṃbandho grahītuṃ śakyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5306: na ca jñātur avidyāyā ca saṃbandhasya yo grahītā, jñānaṃ cānyat tad-viṣayaṃ saṃbhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5312: yadi punar avidyā jñeyā, anyad vā jñeyaṃ jñeyam eva |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5313: tathā jñātāpi jñātaiva, na jñeyaṃ bhavati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5314: yadā caivam, avidyā-duḥkhitvādyair na jñātuḥ kṣetrajñasya kiṃcit duṣyati ||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5315: nanu ayam eva doṣaḥ, yat doṣavat-kṣetra-vijñātṛtvam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5318: yathātra bhagavatā kriyākāraka-phalātmatvābhāva ātmani svata eva darśitaḥ - avidyādhyāropita eva kriyā-kārakādir ātmany upacaryate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5319: tathā tatra tatra ya enaṃ vetti hantāram [Gītā 2.19],
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5321: nādatte kasyacit pāpam [Gītā 5.15] ity ādi-prakaraṇeṣu darśitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5328: satyam evaṃ prāptam, etad eva ca na hi deha-bhṛtā śakyam ity atra darśayiṣyāmaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5329: sarva-śāstrārthopasaṃhāra-prakaraṇe ca samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā ity atra viśeṣato darśayiṣyāmaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5332: idaṃ śarīram [Gītā 13.2] ity-ādi-ślokopadiṣṭasya kṣetrādhyāyārthasya saṃgraha-śloko 'yam upanyasyate tat kṣetraṃ yac cety ādi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5333: vyācikhyāsitasya hy arthasya saṃgrahopanyāso nyāyya iti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5334: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yad-vikāri yataś ca yat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5335: sa ca yo yat-prabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu ||BhG_13.3||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5336: yan nirdiṣṭam idaṃ śarīram iti tat tac-chabdena parāmṛśati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5337: yac ca idaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ kṣetraṃ tat yādṛk yādṛśaṃ svakīyair dharmaiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5339: yad-vikāri yo vikāro yasya tat yad-vikāri, yato yasmāc ca yat, kāryam utpadyate iti vākya-śeṣaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:5340: sa ca yaḥ kṣetrajño nirdiṣṭaḥ sa yat-prabhāvo ye prabhāvā upādhi-kṛtāḥ śaktayo yasya sa yat-prabhāvaś ca |

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6407: evaṃ-bhūtam apy enam atyanta-darśana-gocara-prāptaṃ vimūḍhā dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-viṣaya-bhoga-balākṛṣṭa-cetas tayānekadhā mūḍhā nānupaśyanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6408: aho kaṣṭaṃ vartate ity anukrośati ca bhagavān |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6409: ye tu punaḥ pramāṇa-janita-jñāna-cakṣuṣas ta enaṃ paśyanti jñāna-cakṣuṣo vivikta-dṛṣṭaya ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_15.10||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6411: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6413: yatantaḥ prayatnaṃ kurvanto yoginaś ca samāhita-cittā enaṃ prakṛtam ātmānaṃ paśyanty ayam aham asmīty upalabhanta ātmani svasyāṃ buddhāv avasthitam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6414: yatanto 'pi śāstrādi-pramāṇair akṛtātmāno 'saṃskṛtātmānas tapasā indriya-jayena ca,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6416: aśānta-darpāḥ prayatnaṃ kurvanto 'pi nainaṃ paśyanty acetaso 'vivekinaḥ ||BhGS_15.11||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6418: yat padaṃ sarvasyāvabhāsakamapy agnyādity ādikaṃ jyotiḥ nāvabhāsayate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6419: yat prāptā ca mumukṣavaḥ punaḥ saṃsārābhimukhāḥ na nivartante,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6420: yasya ca padasya upādhi-bhedam anuvidhīyamānāḥ jīvāḥ - ghaṭākāśādayaḥ iva ākāśasya - aṃśāḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6421: tasya padasya sarvātmatvaṃ sarvavyavahārāspadatvaṃ ca vivakṣuś caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ vibhūtisaṃkṣepamāha bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6423: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam ||BhG_15.12||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6425: kiṃ tat ? tejo dīptiḥ prakāśo jagad bhāsayate prakāśayaty akhilaṃ samastam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6428: tat tejo viddhi vijānīhi māmakaṃ madīyaṃ mama viṣṇos taj jyotiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6430: āditya-gataṃ tejaś caitanyātmakaṃ jyotir yac candramasi,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6431: yac cāgnau vartate tat tejo viddhi māmakaṃ madīyaṃ mama viṣṇos taj jyotiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6432: nanu sthāvareṣu jaṅgameṣu ca tat samānaṃ caitanyātmakaṃ jyotiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6433: tatra katham idaṃ viśeṣaṇam - yad āditya-gatam ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6436: atas tatraivāvistaraṃ jyotir iti tad viśiṣyate, na tu tatraiva tad adhikam iti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6437: yathā hi loke tulye 'pi mukha-saṃsthāne na kāṣṭha-kuḍyādau mukham āvirbhavati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6438: ādarśādau tu svacche svacchatare ca tāratamyenāvirbhavati,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6442: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6443: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ ||BhG_15.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6444: gāṃ pṛthivīm āviśya praviśya dhārayāmi bhūtāni jagad aham ojasā balena |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6445: yad balaṃ kāma-rāga-vivarjitam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ jagad-vidhāraṇāya pṛthivyām praviṣṭaṃ yena pṛthivī gurvī nādhaḥ patati na vidīryate ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6446: tathā ca mantra-varṇaḥ - yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā [TaittS 4.1.8] iti,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6447: sa dādhāra pṛthivīm [Ṛk 8.7.3.1] ity ādiś ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6448: ato gām āviśya ca bhūtāni carācarāṇi dhārayāmīti yuktam uktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6450: pṛthivyāṃ jātā oṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ vrīhi-yavādyāḥ puṣṇāmi puṣṭi-matīḥ rasa-svādumatī ca karomi somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ somaḥ san rasātmakaḥ rasa-svabhāvaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6452: sa hi sarva-rasātmakaḥ sarvāḥ oṣadhīḥ svātma-rasān anupraveśayan puṣṇāti ||BhGS_15.13||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6455: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6457: aham eva vai vaiśvānara udara-stho 'gnir bhūtvā - ayam agnir vaiśvānaro yo 'yam antaḥ puruṣe yenedam annaṃ pacyate yad idam adyate [BAU 5.9.1] ity ādi-śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6458_0: vaiśvānaraḥ san prāṇināṃ prāṇavatāṃ deham āśritaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prāṇāpāna-samāyuktaḥ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6458_1: prāṇāpānābhyāṃ samāyuktaḥ saṃyuktaḥ pacāmi paṅkti karomy annam aśanaṃ caturvidhaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6458_2: catuṣprakāraṃ bhojyaṃ bhakṣyaṃ coṣyaṃ lehyaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6461: tad etad ubhayam agnīṣomau sarvam iti paśyato 'nna-doṣa-lepo na bhavati ||BhGS_15.14||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6466: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6468: sarvasya ca prāṇi-jātasyāham ātmā san hṛdi buddhau saṃniviṣṭaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6469: ato matta ātmanaḥ sarva-prāṇināṃ smṛtir jñānaṃ tad-apohanaṃ cāpagamanaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6470: yeṣāṃ yathā puṇya-karmaṇāṃ puṇya-karmānurodhena jñāna-smṛtī bhavataḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6471: tathā pāpa-karmaṇāṃ pāpa-karmānurūpeṇa smṛti-jñānayor apohanaṃ cāpāyanam apagamanaṃ ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6472: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva paramātmā vedyo veditavyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6473: vedānta-kṛd vedāntārtha-saṃpradāya-kṛd ity arthaḥ, veda-vid vedārtha-vid eva cāham ||BhGS_15.15||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6475: bhagavata īśvarasya nārāyaṇākhyasya vibhūti-saṃkṣepa ukto viśiṣṭopādhi-kṛto yad āditya-gataṃ tejaḥ [Gītā 15.12] ity ādinā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6476: athādhunā tasyaiva kṣarākṣaropādhi-pravibhaktatayā nirupādhikasya kevalasya tattva-svarūpa-nirdidhārayiṣayottara-ślokā ārabhyante |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6477: tatra sarvam evātītān āgatān antarādhyāyārtha-jātaṃ tridhā rāśīkṛtya āha -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6478: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6480: dvāv imau pṛthag-rāśī-kṛtau puruṣāv ity ucyete loke saṃsāre - kṣaraś ca kṣaratīti kṣaro vināśī ity eko rāśiḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6483: kṣarākhyasya puruṣasya utpatti-bījam aneka-saṃsāri-jantu-kāma-karmādi-saṃskārāśraya akṣaraḥ puruṣa ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6485: ity āha svayam eva bhagavān - kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni, samastaṃ vikāra-jātam ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6486: kūṭāsthaḥ kūṭāḥ rāśī rāśir iva sthitaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6487: athavā, kūṭā māyā vacanā jihmatā kuṭilatā iti paryāyāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6491: ābhyāṃ kṣarākṣarābhyām anyo vilakṣaṇaḥ kṣarākṣaropādhi-dvaya-doṣeṇāspṛṣṭaḥ nitya-śuddha-buddham ukta-svabhāvaḥ -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6492: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6493: yo loka-trayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ ||BhG_15.17||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6494: uttama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ puruṣas tv anyo 'tyanta-vilakṣaṇa ābhyāṃ paramātmeti paramaś cāsau dehādy-avidyā-kṛtātmabhyaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6496: ity ataḥ paramātmety udāhṛta ukto vedānteṣu |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6497: sa eva viśiṣyate yo loka-trayaṃ bhūr-bhuvaḥ-svar-ākhyaṃ svakīyayā caitanya-bala-śaktyā āviśya praviśya bibharti svarūpa-sad-bhāva-mātreṇa bibharti dhārayati |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6498: avyayo nāsya vyayo vidyata ity avyayaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6501: yathā-vyākhyātasyeśvarasya puruṣottama ity etat nāma prasiddham |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6502: tasya nāma-nirvacana-prasiddhayārthavattvaṃ nāmno darśayan niratiśayo 'ham īśvara ity ātmānaṃ darśayati bhagavān -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6503: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6504: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ ||BhG_15.18||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6505: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'haṃ saṃsāra-māyā-vṛkṣam aśvatthākhyam atikrānto 'ham akṣarād api saṃsāra-māyā-rūpa-vṛkṣa-bīja-bhūtād api cottama utkṛṣṭatamaḥ ūrdhvatamo vā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6506: atas tābhyāṃ kṣarākṣarābhyām uttamatvād asmi loke vede ca prathitaḥ prakhyātaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6507: puruṣottama ity evaṃ māṃ bhakta-janā viduḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6511: athedānīṃ yathā-niruktam ātmānaṃ yo veda, tasyedaṃ phalam ucyate -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6512: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6513: sa sarva-vid bhajati māṃ sarva-bhāvena bhārata ||BhG_15.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6514: yo mām īśvaraṃ yathokta-viśeṣaṇam evaṃ yathoktena prakāreṇa asaṃmūḍhaḥ saṃmoha-varjitaḥ san jānāty ayam aham asmīti puruṣottamaṃ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6515: sa sarva-vit sarvātmanā sarvaṃ vettīti sarvajñaḥ sarva-bhūta-sthaṃ bhajati māṃ sarva-bhāvena sarvātmatayā he bhārata ||BhGS_15.19||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6517: asmin adhyāye bhagavat-tattva-jñānaṃ mokṣa-phalam uktvā, atha idānīṃ tat stauti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6518: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6519: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛta-kṛtyaś ca bhārata ||BhG_15.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6520: iti etad guhyatamaṃ gopyatamam, atyanta-rahasyaṃ ity etat |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6522: yady api gītākhyaṃ samastam śāstram ucyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6523: tathāpy ayam evādhyāya iha śāstram ity ucyate stuty-arthaṃ prakaraṇāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6524: sarvo hi gītā-śāstrārtho 'smin adhyāye samāsena uktaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6525: na kevalaṃ gītā-śāstrārtha eva, kiṃtu sarvaś ca vedārtha iha parisamāptaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6526: yas taṃ veda sa veda-vit [Gītā 15.1] vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyaḥ [Gītā 15.15] iti coktam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6527: idam uktaṃ kathitaṃ mayā he 'nagha apāpa ! etac chāstraṃ yathā-darśitārthaṃ buddhvā buddhimān syāt bhavet nānyathā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6528: kṛta-kṛtyaś ca bhārata kṛtaṃ kṛtyaṃ kartavyaṃ yena sa kṛta-kṛtyaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6529: viśiṣṭa-janma-prasūtena brāhmaṇena yat kartavyaṃ tat sarvaṃ bhagavat-tattve vidite kṛtaṃ bhaved ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6530: na cānyathā kartavyaṃ parisamāpyate kasyacid ity abhiprāyaḥ | sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6533: prāpyaitat kṛta-kṛtyo hi dvijo bhavati nānyathā || [Manu 12.93]
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6535: yataḥ etat paramārthatattvaṃ mattaḥ śrutavān asi, ataḥ kṛtārthas tvaṃ bhārateti ||BhGS_15.20||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6544: daivī āsurī rākṣasī ceti prāṇiṇāṃ prakṛtayo navame 'dhyāye sūcitāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6545: tāsāṃ vistareṇa pradarśanāya abhayaṃ sattva-saṃśuddhir ity ādir adhyāyaḥ ārabhyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6547: nibandhāyāsurī rākṣasī ceti daivyā ādānāya pradarśanaṃ kriyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6550: dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam ||BhG_16.1||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6553: saṃvyavahāreṣu para-vañcanā-māyānṛtādi-parivarjanaṃ śuddha-sattva-bhāvena vyavahāra ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6554: jñāna-yoga-vyavasthitir jñānaṃ śāstrata ācāryataś ca ātmādi-padārthānām avagamaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6568: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6569: dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam ||BhG_16.2||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6572: akrodhaḥ parair ākruṣṭasyābhihatasya vā prāptasya krodhasya upaśamanam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6584: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6588: utpannāyāṃ vikriyāyām praaśamanam akrodha ity avocāma |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6590: dhṛtir dehendriyeṣv avasādaṃ prāpteṣu tasya pratiṣedhako 'ntaḥ-karaṇa-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6592: śaucaṃ dvi-vidhaṃ mṛj-jala-kṛtaṃ bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ ca mano-buddhayor nairmalyaṃ māyā-rāgādi-kāluṣyābhāvaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6595: nātimānitā atyarthaṃ māno 'timānaḥ, sa yasya vidyate so 'timānī |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6597: tad-abhāvo nātimānitā ātmanaḥ pūjyatātiśaya-bhāvanābhāva ity arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6600: ? daivīṃ devānāṃ yā saṃpat tām abhilakṣya jātasya deva-vibhūty-arhasya bhāvi-kalyāṇasyety arthaḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6604: dambho darpo 'timānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6611: yathā kāṇam cakṣuṣmān, virūpaṃ rūpavān, hīnābhijanam uttamābhijana ity ādi |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6614: kim-abhijātasyety āha - saṃpadam āsurīm asurāṇāṃ saṃpat āsurī tām abhijātasya ity arthaḥ ||BhGS_16.4||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6618: mā śucaḥ saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijāto 'si pāṇḍava ||BhG_16.5||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6619: daivī saṃpat yā sā vimokṣāya saṃsāra-bandhanāt |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6620: nibandhāya niyato bandho nibandhas tad-artham āsurī saṃpat matā abhipretā |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6622: tatraivam ukte saty ar junasyāntar-gataṃ bhāvam kim aham āsura-saṃpad-yuktaḥ ?
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6624: ity evam ālocanā-rūpam ālakṣya āha bhagavān - mā śucaḥ śokaṃ mā kārṣīḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6629: dvau bhūta-sargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6630: daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu ||BhG_16.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6631_0: dvau dvi-saṃkhyākau bhūta-sargau bhūtānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ sargau sṛṣṭī bhūta-sargau sṛjyeteti
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6631_1: sargau bhūtāny eva sṛjyamānāni daivāsura-saṃpad-dvaya-yuktānīti dvau bhūta-sargāv ity ucyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6632: dvayā ha vai prājāpatyā devāś cāsurā ca [BAU 1.3.1] iti śruteḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6635: kau tau bhūta-sargau ? ity ucyate - prakṛtāv eva daiva āsura eva ca |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6636: uktayor eva punar anuvāde prayojanam āha - daivo bhūta-sargo 'bhayaṃ sattva-saṃśuddhir ity ādinā vistaraśo vistara-prakāraiḥ proktaḥ kathitaḥ,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6638: atas tat-parivarjanārtham āsuraṃ pārtha me mama vacanād ucyamānaṃ vistaraśaḥ sṛṇu avadhāraya ||BhGS_16.6||
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6640: ā adhyāya-parisamāpter āsurī saṃpat prāṇi-viśeṣaṇatvena pradarśyate,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6641: pratyakṣī-karaṇena ca śakyate tasyāḥ parivarjanaṃ kartum iti -
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6642: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6643: na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate ||BhG_16.7||

GSP33bhgsbh_u:6645: nivṛttiṃ ca etad-viparītāṃ yasmāt anartha-hetoḥ nivartitavyaṃ sā nivṛttis tāṃ ca,
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6646: janā āsurā na vidur na jānanti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6647: na kevalaṃ pravṛtti-nivṛttī eva te na viduḥ, na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6651: asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6653: asatyaṃ yathā vayam anṛta-prāyās tathedaṃ jagat sarvam asatyam |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6654: apratiṣṭhaṃ ca nāsya dharmādharmau pratiṣṭhāto 'pratiṣṭhaṃ ceti |
GSP33bhgsbh_u:6655: te āsurāḥ janāḥ jagad āhur anīśvaram na ca dharmādharma-sa-vyapekṣako 'sya śāsiteśvaro vidyata ity ato 'nīśvaraṃ jagad āhuḥ |
